content: Hilarious KW Stuffing Blogging By: Rand Fishkin October 28, 2005 The author's views are entirely their own (excluding the unlikely event of hypnosis) and may not always reflect the views of Moz. Table of Contents Copied! By: Rand Fishkin October 28, 2005 Hilarious KW Stuffing Blogging The author's views are entirely their own (excluding the unlikely event of hypnosis) and may not always reflect the views of Moz. Donna's got a good post referencing something rmccarley pointed to at SEOChat - this fantastic site on... well, something that they want done in Houston. I'm not even going to rel=nofollow. This kind of art deserves recognition. Makes me wonder if someday, SEOs will have paintings on their wall of CSS code that hides text and external Javascript that re-directs based on IP address. What scares me is that they then have a real site they expect people to get to... Sorry I don't have more time to post great stuff - of which there's plenty this week. Things are busier than ever. Copied! Back to Top
